A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie is garbage and a propaganda film disappointed that Disney would allow this franchise to move in the direction they did.  Strong diverse characters led by Rey\, Finn\, Kylo Ren and Poe Dameron only to be lost in in your face blatant political correctness and the lack of use of strong characters that made Star wars special is just a slap in the face to fans  and unfortunate for new fans.  My kids will not watch this movie again.
